pkgmetadata.longdescription: Get Swiss Federal and Cantonal Vote Results from Opendata.swiss // Builds upon the real time data service as well as the archive for national votes https://opendata.swiss/api/3/action/package_show?id =echtzeitdaten-am-abstimmungstag-zu-eidgenoessischen- abstimmungsvorlagen and cantonal votes https://opendata.swiss/api/3/action/package_show?id =echtzeitdaten-am-abstimmungstag-zu-kantonalen- abstimmungsvorlagen. It brings the results of Swiss popular votes, aggregated at the geographical level of choice, into R.
